title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Hi

Hope you can help

A1466 2017 MODEL POWERS UP BUT LIKE IT NEEDS CHARGER PUT IN THEN NO POWER TAKE CHARGER OUT AND BACK IN POWERS UP

BUT I DID NOTICE 2 CAPS ON PPBUS_S5_HS_COMPUTING WHEN DOES NOT POWER UP VOLTAGE DROPPING C7323+C7324 BUT OTHER CAPS WHICH ARE PPBUS_S5_HS ARE FIXED AT LIKE 8.29V

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Please, don't write entire post in capitals.

Be more explicit.
The machine turns on with battery alone?
It turns of when you connect charger?
What is EXACT PPBUS_G3H voltage with charger alone (no battery)?

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Hi sorry about that
Seems with no battery
Like when charger is plugged in doesn't power up 
But if you take it out an put back in powers up


Seems like needs a kickstart

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Are you using original Magsafe 2 charger?
This machine must turn on automatically when charger is plugged in, if no battery connected.
With battery in place, need to press the power button.

Do you always get amber light on Magsafe?
Even when doesn't turn on?
What is PPBUS_G3H voltage in such case?

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Hi
yes original charger 

Light comes on either time but when put in say 1st time in the day fan no spin
Don't know if its any connection
but PP5V_S4RS3 when fan doesnt spin has 0v 
When take magsafe and replace it back is 5v

Seems like something needs to be charged up first

title: a1466 Powering issue
message: When turns on, PPBUS_G3H is stil 8.29V?

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Hi i will check tomorrow but im sure thats the fuse even when doesnt turn on that is 8. something volts 
I'm just wondering if its a bad cap somewhere

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Exact PPBUS_G3H voltage is very important.
8.2/3V and 8.5/6V is totally different thing!

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Hi i will check tomorrow 
im thinking i have a bad cap

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 96548, member: 682"]
PPBUS_G3H
[/QUOTE]

 PPBUS_G3H= 8.5v

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
That's normal.

PPBUS_G3H drops to 8.3V when machine doesn't want to turn on?
Check SMC_RESET_L level then.

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 96557, member: 682"]
SMC_RESET_L
[/QUOTE]

hI 3.33v and by using the meter probe on 5pin u5110 which is smc_reset fan started spinning

title: a1466 Powering issue
message: SMC_RESET_L has 3V when PPBUS_G3H only 8.3V?

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Change R5100; you can force it with 10-47K.
Inspect J6100 for corrosion; clean, or even remove it, if needed.

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Hi when it doesnt power up if i put a 47k accross it fan powers up
So im guessing the 100k is a little low reads around 88k

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Low readings is normal for onboard measurment.

Check if turns on always using 47K, instead of 100K.

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Hi
I will check i have removed the 100k resistor
Wondering if i should but a replacement in or to put a 47k in its place

When 100k resistor was still there everytime i used a 47k and put over the 2 legs fan powered

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Hi removed j6100 what a battle should have used the air gun

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Did you resolder R6122?

"fan doesnt spin at all"
SMC_RESET_L goes high?
Did you solder 47K, or 100K in place of R5100?

title: a1466 Powering issue
message:
Hi
I currently have no r6122 i need to replace it from another board tommorow

When i changed r5100 i replaced it with a 100k from an older version of the same a1466
But wouldnt self start without a jump when replaced
So i removed j6100 what a mess that made
but i need to replace r6122 as it is missing 
with him missing no fan movement or nothing so im guessing he plays a big role

title: a1466 Powering issue
message: I will check tomorrow but when measured pin 12 on j6100 now he is removed 3.37v but i will double check tomorrow
